Package com.bizosys.hsearch.outpipe

Class Summary
BuildTeaser Builds teaser information
CheckMetaInfo Filters and Ranks on Meta information
ComputeDynamicRanking Ranks the document based on term and meta information.
ComputePreciousness Preciousness is computed after finding detail about the word from the dictionary.
ComputeStaticRanking Static ranking is done based on term weight
ComputeTypeCodes Resolve the term type and document type code.
DictionaryEnrichment Consult the DictionaryManager to find details about the word.
HQueryParser Internally it uses LuceneQueryParser for parsing the query.
HQueryParser.Section  
OutpipeLog  
QuerySequencing There are 2 elements 1 - The Must terms / Optional terms 2 - The term preciousness ------------------------- Must Optional ------------------------- 0 0 Do nothing 0 1 Convert optional as must, perform search 0 Many Load all the IDs (Parallel) 1 0 Regular Search 1 1 Perform Must, Filter Optional 1 Many Perform Must, Filtered Optionals in parallel Many 0 Sequential must terms on preciousness order Many 1 Sequential must terms on preciousness order + Filtered Optional Many Many Sequential must terms on preciousness order + Filtered Optionals in parallel
SequenceProcessor Process each keyword of the given query in multiple steps Must terms gets processes sequentially with search with in IDs Multiple Optional terms gets processes parallely.
